text: Lambros Lambrou (born September 9, 1977 in Famagusta, Cyprus) is a former international Cypriot football defender who last played for Nea Salamis Famagusta FC and previously for Ermis Aradippou and the national team of Cyprus. In the past he played also for Ethnikos Achnas and Anorthosis. ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1977 births Category:Cypriot footballers Category:Cyprus international footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Cypriot First Division players Category:Anorthosis Famagusta FC players Category:Ethnikos Achna FC players Category:Ermis Aradippou FC players Category:Nea Salamis Famagusta FC players
title: Lambros Lambrou (footballer)
